MultipartyInfoAuthRequest.name: MultipartyInfoAuthRequest
MultipartyInfoAuthRequest.description: Tracks a request for multiple parties of authorization on a Data Use Purpose. For example, consent requests to share the required documents to open a joint financial account or share mortgage disclosures to loan applicants (borrower + co-borrower).

AuthorizationType.description: The number of parties needed for consent- all parties must accept / majority parties need to consent or at least one party must consent.

DataUsePurposeId.description: Reference to the purpose of this request.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the info authorization request record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ResponseStatus.description: The consentees' aggregate response to this request, based on the authorization type.

SourceRecordId.description: The record from which this consent request is created.
